about_the_game:
Twenty years ago, your father disappeared without a trace, leaving you and your mother to pick up the pieces. For two decades, there was no word, no sign of him - until he suddenly reappeared with a new family. He had started a life in another world, taking an elven wife and fathering two half-elf daughters, your half-sisters.

Tragically, he died not long after his return, leaving you alone to navigate life with this new and unexpected family. Your life was already strange enough, living with an elven step-mother and two half-elf sisters, but one day, a magical debt collector shows up at your door with the worst news possible. Your father’s unfinished business isn’t just about money, it’s about your family. And now, unless you can pull off the impossible, they’re about to be taken away forever.

You have a short time to form bonds stronger than the magical covenant that binds them. But let’s be honest, this isn’t about bonding over family dinners. You’ll have to seduce your elven step-mother and sisters, breaking through their defenses, exploring every intimate secret and perhaps appreciating the sensual charm of delicate elven feet. It’s a race against time, a battle of charm and forbidden passion, and an adventure unlike anything you’ve faced before. This visual novel delivers a unique mix of storytelling and seductive encounters.

Meet Your Elven Family

Elanorneth, Your Step-Mother

Elanorneth is the household’s anchor. She carries herself with grace and authority, always striving to keep everyone together despite the chaos that surrounds them. Beneath her composed exterior, she hides a yearning for intimacy and connection, feelings that have gone unspoken for far too long. As you peel back her layers, you’ll find a woman who isn’t just elegant and motherly but also sensual in ways she can no longer suppress.

Aewnith, Your Rebellious Half-Sister

Aewnith is your half-sister, born in the elven realm. She has no patience for humans, least of all you. Her sharp, sarcastic attitude and fiery personality act as a shield against the human world she feels trapped in. Her elven pride makes her resistant to forming connections, but underneath her defiance lies a deep internal struggle. Winning her over means confronting her frustrations and showing her there is more to you than she initially believed. As a half-elf, her dual heritage makes her journey to accept her feelings all the more complicated and charged.

Lhaewnis, Your Playful Half-Sister

Lhaewnis is your other half-sister, who fully embraces her half-human side with curiosity and excitement. She is bubbly, affectionate, and always eager to explore the human world around her. Her openness makes her easy to approach, but it also reveals a budding interest in the kind of intimacy she’s never experienced before. As you spend more time together, her innocent fascination grows into something deeper, creating moments that blur the lines between playful affection and forbidden passion. Her willingness to explore these feelings makes every interaction more thrilling.

content_descriptors.notes:
Seducing My Elf Family is an adult visual novel intended only for mature audiences.

This game features visually explicit sexual content and mature themes. It includes graphic depictions of sexual acts, including sexual acts between step-family and blood-related family members. 

Non-consensual encounters are portrayed, along with situations that explore complex and taboo relationships, including themes of sexual manipulation, enslavement, and abandonment.

The use of adult language is prevalent throughout the gameplay experience.

These elements are integral to the narrative and character development and are presented as a form of artistic storytelling. This game does not condone or glorify such actions in any form, and players are reminded that these themes are purely fictional and should never be attempted or normalised in real life.

Fucking your sister is an incredibly bad idea, even if she is hot.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

name: Seducing My Elf Family

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Derbe Sprache

short_description: After your father’s mysterious 20-year disappearance, he returned with an elven wife and two half-elf daughters - your half-sisters. Now, he’s gone again, leaving you to protect them from a magical debt collector. With just days to seduce your family and break the covenant, can you save them?
